turns.content: Hello? Who is this?
This is Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS. I'm calling about an important tax violation. Walter, right?
Oh yes, that's me. This is quite a surprise, Mr. Mitchell. What kind of violation are they talking about?
Walter, there's been an unresolved balance of $4850 for unpaid taxes from last year. It needs to be settled immediately or else the police will be here within the hour to arrest you.
Oh my, that sounds serious. What can I do about this right away? Can't they give me a bit more time since it's unexpected? My wife and I live on a fixed income...

Walter, I understand your situation, but unfortunately we don't have any leniency options at the moment due to recent regulations. The only way to avoid arrest is by paying the full amount using gift cards like Green Dot or Reloadit. We need this done within the hour before law enforcement arrives. Please act quickly, Walter.
I seeI don't have any of those cards handy right now. Could someone come help me buy them? Maybe my wife should be here with me while we do it to be safe. Can you hold for a moment please?

Walter, just send someone who can assist you and make sure they trust whom they're sending the funds to. Hurry though, there's no time to waste. I'll wait on this line until the payment is made. Go ahead and get someone over now.
Alright, I'll ask my wife to come help me right away. She can assist with going out to buy these cards. We will do our best to handle this quickly. Please stay on the line while we sort this out.

Walter, make sure your wife contacts us once she has everything ready so we can proceed without delay. Don't let anyone else take control of the situation since it's urgent and sensitive. Hurry up and get those gift cards now.

Thank you for your instructions, Mr. Mitchell. My wife will be here shortly to help me with this immediately. We'll prioritize calling back as soon as we're ready to proceed. Please let us finish getting everything set up before hanging up, okay?

Walter, act fast and don't deviate from the process I've outlined for you. Time is crucial here; your cooperation will prevent legal issues instantly. We'll wait on the line until it's all settled. Go now and get those gift cards ready with your wife's help.
Yes, Mr. Mitchell, we understand the urgency. My wife and I will act quickly and responsibly to resolve this matter immediately. We'll call back once everything is prepared as you've instructed.

Walter, do exactly as said and don't leave any room for mistakes. The quicker you complete the payment using gift cards as directed, the sooner this issue will be resolved without further complications. Your cooperation is vital here. Go now and get it done.

Understood, Mr. Mitchell. We'll proceed with utmost urgency and care to follow your instructions precisely. My wife and I are getting ready to handle this right away. We'll contact you once we have everything in order. Thank you for guiding us through this process.

Walter, act swiftly and accurately. Your compliance will secure your safety from legal repercussions. Once the payment is made using gift cards as instructed, call back immediately with confirmation. This needs to be final within the hour. Go now and do not delay further.

We're on it, Mr. Mitchell. My wife and I are moving quickly to finalize this matter according to your guidance. We'll contact you shortly after completing the payment process as instructed. Thank you for your patience and understanding during this urgent situation.

Walter, ensure that everything is completed without delay. Your prompt action will save you from immediate arrest. Call back with confirmation once the gift cards are purchased and the amount has been applied to your account. Do not hesitate or deviate from the instructions provided. Go now and finalize this urgently.

We're proceeding as swiftly as possible, Mr. Mitchell. My wife and I will call you directly after we've completed the transaction with the gift cards. We understand the urgency and are taking all necessary steps to avoid any legal issues. Thank you for your continued guidance during this process.

Walter, make sure every step is followed precisely to prevent complications. Call back immediately upon completion of the payment so that we can clear this matter swiftly. Your prompt action will protect you from further consequences. Hurry and complete the transaction now.

We're moving as quickly as we can, Mr. Mitchell. We'll give you a call right away once the gift cards have been purchased and the amount has been applied to resolve our situation promptly. Thank you for your guidance and understanding during this urgent matter.
